variants.Description in input context: A common variant initially identified as c.1886A>G, was found to segregate with disease status.

Material used.Description: Experiments using patient-derived fibroblasts showed a significant reduction in mitochondrial membrane potential compared to controls.

Readout description.Result Description: Patient fibroblasts showed a significant reduction in mitochondrial membrane potential compared to control fibroblasts.

Technical replicates.Description: Each condition was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type sequence was utilized as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: CRISPR knockout of *PINK1* was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.

Experiment Method.Assay Method: Mitophagy Assay using iPSC-derived Dopaminergic Neurons

Material used.Description: Experiments using induced pluripotent stem cells (iPSCs) differentiated into dopaminergic neurons, revealed impaired mitophagy.

Readout description.Result Description: Mitophagy was impaired in iPSC-derived dopaminergic neurons carrying the PINK1 variant.

Technical replicates.Description: Each condition was tested in triplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: Wild-type sequence was utilized as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: CRISPR knockout of *PINK1* was used as a negative control.

Statistical analysis method.Statistical analysis method: ANOVA was used for statistical analysis.
